node_info.name: errorTrigger
node_info.description: Triggers the workflow when another workflow has an error

metadata.details: In n8n, when a workflow execution fails, it can start another workflow. This second workflow can be any arbitrary workflow on your n8n instance. Use the Error Trigger node as your Trigger in the Error workflow.

properties.displayName: This node will trigger when there is an error in another workflow, as long as that workflow is set up to do so. More info
